AUTH.COMPANY_DOT_ERROR: Please enter a valid company dot.
AUTH.PASSWORD_ERROR: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
HOME.UNIDENTIFIED_DRIVING: We detected a change in location compared to your last non-driving duty status. To allow us to automatically update your duty status to Driving, please ensure your vehicle is stationary and connect to your vehicle. If the connection cannot be established for some reason, please change your duty status to Driving manually.
HOME.VEHICLE_OFF: Vehicle went through power-off ignition cycle, please confirm continuation of indication of personal use? If you don't respond before vehicle exceeds motion speed threshold ({motionTreshold}mph) your indication of personal use will be cleared.
HOME.VEHICLE_STATIONARY: Vehicle has been stationary for last 5 minutes, in order to save time you may want to consider changing your duty status? If you dont respond within 60 seconds your duty status will be changed to On Duty.

SHEETS.CONNECTION.CONNECTION_MAIN_DESCRI: Upon connection, vehicle gets assigned automatically, but operating disconnected requires manual selection.

SHEETS.CONNECTION.MAC_ADDRESS_ERROR: Please enter a valid MAC address.
SHEETS.CONNECTION.CONNECT_MANUALLY_DESCR: In order to connect please enter the MAC address, listed on the back of the black box, in the field below:
SHEETS.CONNECTION.CONNECT_MANUALLY_HELP: Please make sure that the vehicle ignition is turned on.
SHEETS.CONNECTION.OPERATE_DISCONNECTED_D: Due to privacy reasons, manual vehicle selection is only available through VIN # search.

DIALOGS.RETRIEVING_AND_SCANNING.TITLE: Retrieving & Scanning
DIALOGS.RETRIEVING_AND_SCANNING.DESCRIPT: App is retrieving events recorded while your device was disconnected and scanning for unidentified trips. The app will be available again once this process is finished.
DIALOGS.CONFIGURE_MAP.TITLE: Configure
DIALOGS.ENTER_PASSCODE.TITLE: One-Time Passcode
DIALOGS.ENTER_PASSCODE.DESCRIPTION: To start the inspection please create a one time passcode. That passcode will be needed to finish the inspection.
DIALOGS.EXIT_PASSCODE.TITLE: One-Time Passcode
DIALOGS.EXIT_PASSCODE.DESCRIPTION: Please enter your previously created one-time passcode to finish the inspection.
DIALOGS.RECERTIFY.TITLE: Re-Certify
DIALOGS.RECERTIFY.DESCRIPTION:
You are trying to perform an action that will modify already certified 24-hour period(s).To authorize this modification, your agreement to the following statement is required.

I hereby certify that my data entries and my record of duty status for this 24-hour period are true and correct.
DIALOGS.CERTIFY.TITLE: Certify
DIALOGS.CERTIFY.DESCRIPTION: I hereby certify that my data entries and my record of duty status for this 24-hour period are true and correct.
DIALOGS.CERTIFY_ALL.TITLE: Certify All
DIALOGS.CERTIFY_ALL.DESCRIPTION: I hereby certify that my data entries and my record of duty status for all 24-hour periods are true and correct.
DIALOGS.STATUS.DESCRIPTION: Your current duty status is not compatible with the action you are trying to perform. If you want to proceed you will need to change your duty status to the compatible one.
DIALOGS.TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: Please select transfer method and, if provided, enter safety official code in the comment field.
DIALOGS.TRIGGER.TITLE: Trigger
DIALOGS.UPDATE.TITLE: Update Required
DIALOGS.UPDATE.DESCRIPTION: To ensure compliance and provide the best experience, updating to the most recent version of our app is now required for all users.
DIALOGS.STATUS_INCOMPATIBLE.TITLE: Status Incompatible
DIALOGS.STATUS_INCOMPATIBLE.DESCRIPTION: Your current duty status is not compatible with the action you are trying to perform. If you want to proceed you will need to change your duty status to the compatible one.
DIALOGS.REVIEW.TITLE: For Review
DIALOGS.REVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Before proceeding, there are some things that you should review.
DIALOGS.CLAIM_TRIP.DESCRIPTION: Please select with which duty status would you prefer trip to end.
DIALOGS.LOG_EXCEPTIONS.TITLE: Exceptions
DIALOGS.LOG_NOTE.TITLE: Daily Note
DIALOGS.LOG_NOTE.DESCRIPTION: Please enter your previously created one-time passcode to finish the inspection.
DIALOGS.ANNOTATE.TITLE: Annotate
DIALOGS.ANNOTATE.DESCRIPTION: To help officers better understand this HoS violation, please annotate it with explanation why you continued to drive past the legal limit.
DIALOGS.RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset Password
DIALOGS.RESET_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: To re-set your password please follow the steps below:
DIALOGS.DEMO_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Demo Account Notice
DIALOGS.DEMO_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This demo account uses pre-populated, mock data for demonstration purposes. It is not real data and thus data transfer to FMCSA has been disabled. Please note that the app will automatically log you out after 30 minutes.
PERMISSIONS.PERMISSIONS_DENIED_DESCRIPTI:
In order to comply with regulations, our app requires specific system permissions to be granted. These permissions are essential to ensure that our app meets the mandated legal requirements. 
Please tap the 'Grant' button below to provide the required permissions.
